advancement.thinair:root.desc: The air is not always breathable deep in the earth and in other dimensions
advancement.thinair:air_bladder.desc: Use an Air Bladder to refill your air supply on the go
advancement.thinair:soul.desc: Breathe the life force given off by Soul Fire to maintain your air (but not increase it!)
advancement.thinair:soulfire_bottle.desc: Restore your lungs with the souls trapped in a Bottle of Soulfire
advancement.thinair:protection_from_yell: Protect yourself from choking air with something like a Respirator
Breathe freely where there is no air at all
advancement.thinair:lantern.desc: Use a Safety Lantern to check the air quality around you
advancement.thinair:disco_lantern.desc: Use a piece of Dye to manually change the color of a Safety Lamp (you can scrape the color off with an axe)
advancement.thinair:signal_torch.desc: Right-click a torch to make it spew particles, perhaps to signal the exit of a cave
